commits.subject: chore: add GoReleaser and Relicta release configuration
commits.author: Felix Geelhaar
commits.raw_message: chore: add GoReleaser and Relicta release configuration

commits.subject: feat: add write-back, embedding export, and agent policies (Phase 3)
commits.author: Felix Geelhaar
commits.raw_message:
feat: add write-back, embedding export, and agent policies (Phase 3)

Implement three major features completing the Phase 3 roadmap:

1. Local-first write-back with outbox pattern — annotation bounded context
   for agent notes, CQRS WriteRepository for action item overrides, SQLite
   local store, outbox dispatcher for future upstream sync, MCP tools
   (add_note, list_notes, delete_note, complete_action_item, update_action_item)
   and CLI commands (note add/list/delete, action complete/update).

2. Provider-agnostic embedding export — Chunk value object, three chunking
   strategies (BySpeakerTurn, ByTimeWindow, ByTokenLimit), JSONL format,
   export_embeddings MCP tool and CLI command.

3. Per-meeting agent policies — domain policy value objects with first-match-wins
   evaluation, YAML policy file loader, redaction engine (emails, speakers,
   keywords, custom patterns), PolicyMiddleware wrapping MCP HandleToolJSON
   for ACL enforcement and recursive JSON redaction. Enabled via
   GRANOLA_MCP_POLICY_FILE env var.

377 tests, 0 race conditions, all new packages ≥80% coverage.

commits.subject: feat: add event streaming, webhook adapter, and multi-workspace support
commits.author: Felix Geelhaar
commits.raw_message:
feat: add event streaming, webhook adapter, and multi-workspace support

Phase 2 implementation adding three capabilities:

- Event streaming: domain events dispatched as MCP resource notifications
  via EventDispatcher/MCPNotifier with background sync polling manager
- Webhook adapter: HTTP transport with /health endpoint, HMAC-SHA256
  validated /webhook/granola endpoint, --transport and --port CLI flags
- Multi-workspace: workspace repository, use cases, list_workspaces MCP
  tool, workspace://{id} resource, and workspace list CLI command

Also refactors NewServer to use ServerOptions struct for cleaner
dependency injection. 212 tests passing, 0 race conditions.
